SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Province] ( [Province_Ky] tinyint IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [Province_Codice] varchar(10) NULL , [Province_Provincia] varchar(50) NULL , [Province_ProvinciaHTML] varchar(50) NULL , [Regioni_Codice] varchar(10) NULL , [Province_Zona] varchar(10) NULL , [Province_UserInsert] int NULL , [Province_UserUpdate] int NULL , [Province_UserDelete] int NULL , [Province_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [Province_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [Province_DateDelete] datetime NULL , [Regioni_Ky] int NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Province] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_Province PRIMARY KEY ([Province_Ky])
